input_args.text: "The statistic that Obamacare plan premiums are increasing by an average of 25% is misleading, because a large portion of those increased rates get at least partially paid for relatively poor customers by the US Government through the provisions of Obamacare. If it weren't for Obamacare, those customers would not be able to afford healthcare insurance at all, and most of our commercial healthcare insurance companies would be raising their premiums even fast than that as was the case prior to the enactment of Obamacare."
